title: Game To Kill Humans and Get 100 Points. But My Priority Is To Play With Neko Girl - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Seinen
tags: Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Monster Girls   R-18   Transported to Another World
author: 槙村 淳弥
description:
One day, thirty-two students from Izumisakura Gakuen were transferred to another world. They were forced to play a killing game to collect 100 points.
A beautiful genius, Mizunoha Yanagi. Ryusei Kirihara, the back bencher of the school. A lonely gal, Maia Tokino. An elf-loving nerd, Kunai Matsuda. Handsome Ikemen, Minegishi Kakeru. The shinobi like, Kasuzu.

In addition, there was also another man who was extremely talented. But he happened to love beastmen. That was the main character, Tokiteru Terashima.
This story is in a different-world made of extraordinary erotic mysteries that revolves around teamwork, betrayals, cautiousness, planning, and hatred.>
